node.title: Police appeal for video footage of assault on Waikato Expressway
node.description: A man who was injured on the Waikato Expressway yesterday after being pulled from his vehicle and assaulted is in a critical but stable condition, police say.
node.content:
["A man who was injured on the Waikato Expressway yesterday after being pulled from his vehicle and assaulted is in a critical but stable condition, police say.", "", "
\nPhoto: Supplied / NZTA\n
", "Police were called to the expressway south of Rangiri around 4.45pm yesterday.", "Police said the investigation into the incident is continuing today.", "They want to hear from anyone who may have footage of the incident recorded on their dashcams or cellphones.", "Anyone who can help police is asked to call 105 and quote event number P049885631.", "Police say any electronic recordings of the event can be uploaded via the following link: https://rangiriri.nzpolice.org/"]
